articles.title: M&M share price jumps over 7% to record high as analysts remain bullish, raise target price after strong Q4 results | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd (M&M) reported a net profit growth of 31.6% year-on-year (YoY) at  ₹2,038.21 crore in the fourth quarter of FY24. The company’s net profit in the year-ago quarter was  ₹1,548.97 crore.
